solution_accelerators.name: Multi-Agent Custom Automation Engine
solution_accelerators.description: Delegate complex, repetitive tasks to AI agents that act on your behalfâ€”executing work efficiently and ensuring results align with standards. This enterprise-ready multi-agent framework enables autonomous task execution, workflow orchestration, and intelligent decision-making.

solution_accelerators.name: Content Processing Accelerator
solution_accelerators.description: Extract data and apply schemas across multi-modal content (text, images, tables, graphs) with confidence scoring and user validation. Process claims, invoices, contracts, and structured documents quickly and accurately. Maps unstructured content to structured formats with high precision.
prerequisites: Azure AI Content Understanding Service access

solution_accelerators.name: Unified Data Foundation with Fabric
solution_accelerators.description: Establish a unified, integrated, and governed analytics platform using medallion lakehouse architecture in Microsoft Fabric. Enables data mesh concepts with domain schemas, shared data models, and seamless integration with Azure Databricks for multi-platform analytics.

solution_accelerators.name: Agentic Applications for Unified Data
solution_accelerators.description: Empower organizations with agentic AI solutions built on a unified data foundation. Leverage AI agents with seamless Fabric integration, Agent Framework orchestration, and natural language querying. Automate routine processes and enable business users to query trusted data easily.

solution_accelerators.name: RAG Chat with Your Data
solution_accelerators.description: Create a ChatGPT-like frontend experience over your own documents using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). Uses Azure OpenAI Service for LLM access and Azure AI Search for indexing and semantic retrieval. Available in Python, TypeScript, .NET, and Java.

solution_accelerators.name: Intelligent Apps with Semantic Kernel
solution_accelerators.description: Enterprise-ready orchestration framework for building intelligent AI agents and multi-agent systems. Model-agnostic SDK supporting OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Hugging Face, and more. Includes plugin ecosystem, vector DB integration, and multi-agent orchestration.

solution_accelerators.name: Microsoft Fabric Samples
solution_accelerators.description: Comprehensive samples repository showcasing Microsoft Fabric capabilities. Includes documentation samples, feature demonstrations, and community-contributed examples. Perfect for learning Fabric hands-on with real-world scenarios.

solution_accelerators.name: TechConnect RAG System (Multi-Modal)
solution_accelerators.description: Advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system ingesting GitHub solution accelerators and Microsoft documentation. Features vector-based semantic search, solution area filtering (AI, Cloud, Security, Data), complexity level filtering (L200-L400), and Responsible AI guardrails. Production-ready with Azure Container Apps deployment.

solution_accelerators.name: TechConnect3: Azure AI Search Integration
solution_accelerators.description: Complete implementation of Azure AI Search with Azure Cognitive Services. Demonstrates semantic search, vector indexing, Azure OpenAI integration, and Blob Storage-based document processing. Includes indexer configurations and query patterns for enterprise search scenarios.

solution_accelerators.name: TechConnect4: Data Fabric & Analytics
solution_accelerators.description: Enterprise data analytics platform using Azure services. Combines AI Search for indexing, Blob Storage for data lakes, and Azure OpenAI for intelligent querying. Demonstrates modern data architecture patterns with assistant-based query interfaces.

solution_accelerators.name: TechConnect5: Advanced RAG Patterns
solution_accelerators.description: Advanced RAG implementation with sophisticated retrieval patterns, query rewriting, and multi-step reasoning. Includes solution accelerator testing, evaluation frameworks, and production deployment patterns for complex AI workflows.

solution_accelerators.name: TechConnect6: MVP Framework & Architecture
solution_accelerators.description: Complete MVP framework for building AI-powered applications. Includes quickstart guides, architecture documentation, deployment scripts, and reference implementations. Demonstrates best practices for moving from POC to production with proper governance and testing.

solution_accelerators.name: Guidance: Advanced Prompt Engineering
solution_accelerators.description: Efficient programming paradigm for steering large language models. Control output structure with regex constraints, context-free grammars, and interleaved control flow. Reduces latency and cost while improving output quality through constrained generation.
prerequisites: LLM backend (OpenAI, Hugging Face, llama.cpp, etc)

solution_accelerators.name: System2-RAG POC Generator (Active)
solution_accelerators.description: Live POC generation system using RAG with semantic search. Generates proof-of-concept proposals based on solution accelerator catalog. Features 4-tab interface: POC Generator, Solution Search, History, System Status. Auto-detects environment (local/Azure) for API routing.

solution_accelerators.name: Guidance: Advanced Prompt Engineering
solution_accelerators.description: Structured prompt engineering framework for precise LLM output. Uses constrained generation, context-free grammars, and interleaved control flow. Enables high-quality output generation with reduced latency and cost compared to traditional prompting.

solution_areas.name: AI
solution_areas.description: Artificial Intelligence, machine learning, and agentic systems

solution_areas.name: Azure (Data & AI)
solution_areas.description: Data platforms, analytics, and AI infrastructure on Azure

solution_areas.name: Cloud & AI Platforms
solution_areas.description: Multi-cloud and hybrid AI platform solutions
